<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/staff/unban/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows an admin or staff member to unban a user by providing their user ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"user":{"description":"The ID of the user to unban. Must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId.","type":"string"}},"required":["user"]}},"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"user":{"description":"The ID of the user to unban. Must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId.","type":"string"}},"required":["user"]}},"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"user":{"description":"The ID of the user to unban. Must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId.","type":"string"}},"required":["user"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
